name: Dirty Hands
description: Add 2 bad bacteria to a zone.
educationalFact: Unwashed hands can carry thousands of bacteria and spread infections.

name: Sugary Snack Binge
description: Add 1 bad bacteria to a zone.
educationalFact: Excess sugar feeds harmful bacteria and yeast in the gut.

name: Chronic Stress
description: Remove 1 good bacteria from a zone.
educationalFact: Stress hormones change the gut environment.

name: Antibiotics for Virus
educationalFact: Antibiotics cannot kill viruses. Using them for viral infections is wasteful.

name: Superbug Outbreak
description: Convert 1 good bacteria to bad bacteria.
educationalFact: Superbugs are bacteria that resist multiple antibiotics.

name: Travel Sickness
description: Add 3 bad bacteria to a zone.
educationalFact: Travelers often encounter new bacteria their gut isn't prepared for.

name: Junk Food Diet
description: Add 2 bad bacteria and remove 1 good bacteria.
educationalFact: Processed foods lack fiber and nutrients that good bacteria need.

name: Self-Medication
educationalFact: Taking antibiotics without a prescription increases resistance.

name: Skipped Antibiotic Dose
educationalFact: Skipping doses allows bacteria to recover and develop resistance.

name: Contaminated Food
description: Add 2 bad bacteria to this zone and 1 random other zone.
educationalFact: Improperly stored food can harbor dangerous bacteria.

name: Sleep Deprivation
description: Remove 2 good bacteria from a zone.
educationalFact: Just one week of poor sleep can alter your gut microbiome.

name: Excessive Alcohol
description: Remove 2 good bacteria and add 1 bad bacteria.
educationalFact: Heavy alcohol damages the gut lining and kills beneficial bacteria.

name: Antibiotic Hoarding
educationalFact: Saving leftover antibiotics leads to improper use later.

name: Sedentary Lifestyle
description: Add 1 bad bacteria to this zone and 1 random other zone.
educationalFact: Lack of exercise reduces gut microbiome diversity.

name: Infection Spread
description: Add 2 bad bacteria to a zone.
educationalFact: Infections can spread rapidly when hygiene is poor.
